data.title: ABBEYS, CASTLES AND ANCIENT HALL OF ENGLAND AND WALES Their Legendary Lore & Popular history by Timbs (John): Good Red Cloth
data.meta_description: Red Cloth - Frederick Warne and Co Ltd, London and New York - Condition: Good - No Dust Jacket - THREE VOLUMES: SOUTH, xii, 1p list of illustrations, 577pp; MIDLAND, x, 1p list of illustrations, 576pp; NORTH & WALES, ix, 1p list of illustrations, 573pp; illustrated with black & white photos as plates, some foxing to rear of plates and occasionally to the pages surrounding the plates, otherwise clean and crisp, SOUTH lacks front free endpaper and has some damp staining to the fore and bottom edges and the bottom margin of final quarter of book, MIDLAND has the start of a crack at the title page but the binding is still firm, red top stain, red cloth, gilt spine lettering and decoration, SOUTH has some damp staining to the fore edge of both boards, no dust jackets. Size: 7 x 4.25 Inches - ABBEYS, CASTLES AND ANCIENT HALL OF ENGLAND AND WALES Their Legendary Lore & Popular history
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

Payment required in advance. All payments in sterling - we accept most major credit cards, bank drafts, postal orders, cheques (drawn on UK accounts), or cash if you would like to collect from the shop.

If not entirely happy with your purchase please return within 14 days for a full refund minus postage costs.

Normal terms for trade.

Shipping Terms:

Orders usually ship within 2 business days. Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG and shipped in the UK. If your book order is heavy or oversized, or you require shipping outside the UK, we will contact you to let you know if any extra charges apply.
